reset_password_email_arravied: If email arravied in your email, click for redirect to reset passord screen.
reset_password_put_email: Put your email account, and will be send a message with validation link to change passsword.
onboard_welcome_description: TaskForge is designed to streamline your project management process and help you stay organized.
onboard_welcome_task_management_descript: Create, assign, and track tasks effortlessly. Stay on top of deadlines and monitor progress with ease.
onboard_welcome_agile_description: Visualize your workflow and streamline your team's work using customizable agile boards. Move tasks across different stages effortlessly.
